question:
[David] and his sister [Jean] have been best friends ever since childhood. [Larry] asked his brother [Craig] if he would come help him fix his car next weekend. [George] and his son [Larry] went to the cinema together. [Jean] was always arguing with her mother's husband [George]. [Craig] likes to visit his sister. Her name is [Jean]. [Chuck] likes to visit his sister. Her name is [Judy]. [Jean] bought her mother, [Judy], a puppy for her birthday.
Question: How is [Chuck] related to [David]?
